title: Chapter 1472 - Five Divine Emissaries
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1472 - Five Divine Emissaries

As that terrifying aura swept outward, a figure suddenly appeared.

A stick-thin elder in green robes and a dark golden jade crown appeared. His face was long and bony.

Wisps of off-white lightning crackled around him, flashing with terrifying, forbidden power.

The nearby cultivators were stricken by the sight of him, as if they’d just witnessed the descent of a god!

“Another divine emissary!” Su Yi’s brow furrowed slightly.

In truth, he wasn’t just basing this judgment on his recent experiences. When the red-robed man and stick-thin elder in green appeared, the typically dormant Sword of the Nine Hells awakened in his sea of consciousness. It was surging with terrifying murderous intent.

This had happened when Mi Zhen and the Tailor used their respective deities’ power too!

It was just that Su Yi had repressed the Sword of the Nine Hells’ unusual movements, preventing it from attacking. Now, the sword was acting up again!

“And who might you be, sir?” The youthful man in red asked.

“My name is Lu Tong, and I serve the Thousandwing Demon God. Greetings, Fellow Daoist,” the green-robed elder said with a smile, clasping...
